name: Honey to the Bee - Long silk scarf
description:
Long silk scarf inspired by patterns and colours found naturally in bees, flora and insects, making an unusual gift. Authentic home grown illustrations and designs from my current collection of work.

This hand-illustrated design is printed onto luxuriously soft and lightweight 100% silk habotai and is hand finished in Britain. The scarf is presented in a hand screen printed monochromatic box and lined with acid free tissue paper.

Care and cleaning instructions are included.

Dimensions
Width: 150 cm  |  Height: 20 cm

name: Yellow Bee - Small Coin Purse
description:
Small purse inspired by patterns and colours found naturally in bees, flora and insects, making an unusual gift. Authentic home grown illustrations and designs from my current collection of work.

This hand-illustrated design is printed onto soft but robust cotton calico and finished with a colour cotton lining, made in Britain. Every purse is special and unique. A variety of contrasting coloured linings teamed with carefully chosen sections from the print, with no two being identical due to the making process.

This sized purse is great as a handy everyday coin purse or even used as a holiday purse for keeping earnings and other items of jewellery safe. Easily cleaned by hand with warm soapy water and left to air dry.

Dimensions
Width: 8 cm  |  Height: 9 cm  |  Depth: 4 cm
